a.title: School Committee Meeting on School Closure

div.a: School Committee Meeting on School Closure

nav.div: Needham Public Schools » Departments » Superintendent's Office » Updates/Information During School Closure

div.p:
For the health and wellbeing of our community, we are continuing with plans to keep our schools closed. Together, we will do our part to mitigate the spread of COVID-19.
This webpage will provide families with important updates to support you while school is not in session. There are links on the left-hand side of this page with answers to frequently asked questions, timely communications from our Superintendent as he responds to the quickly changing news from health and government officials, resources for learning and connecting with Needham Public Schools staff, among other important school and community information.
Rest assured that Needham Public Schools will keep all our children and families at the forefront, providing ongoing support, guidance and education.
For an update on Remote Learning in the Needham Public Schools, check the Needham Channel's videotaped presentation of the April 7th School Committee Meeting.
Please visit this page again as the information will be updated regularly and feel free to contact our Superintendent via phone at 781-455-0400 x11203 or email: dan_gutekanst@needham.k12.ma.us

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
